snippet.title: DARK LIGHT Underground World Content Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Dark Light Major Update is available now on Steam! Special offer ends on 26th September.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1134520/Dark_Light/


Gem and Stone upgrade system
We have opened the Gem shop in town, which for you to upgrade your weapon in a dynamic way. You can choose to customize your favourite weapons by enhancing their elemental damage to the enemies. We have now introduced 4 elementals, which are Fire, Ice, Lightning and Poison. But be careful, each enemy has its own sensitivity to different elements. You can find those treasures by killing special enemies and in some secret areas.


Health, Energy and weapon upgrade
Upgrading your player and weapons are no longer just about currency. For your character to become stronger, you will also need to find energy stones, which means you will need to explore the world more.


Extend world, more weapons and more enemies
- To open the extended world, you will need to find a special key. Explore more, fight more!
- We have introduced another elite enemy and a major boss in the extended world. Go challenge them, you will get more reward!
- Of course, there will be new weapons! You will be looking for 2 more melee weapons and 1 more range weapon. All of them have rare quality. You’ll love them once mastering them.
